name: mortdeus
body:
##about
**I am a minimalist.**  
**I am 21 years old.**  
**I only write opensource software.**  
**I view programming as a form of art.**  
**I am also a musician.**  
##projects
[**gordon**](http://mortdeus.github.com/gordon) [**gocos2d**](http://www.gocos2d.org)
##art
**powered by gophers**  
![blue gopher](http://i.imgur.com/5w0lx.png) ![pink gopher](http://i.imgur.com/47bgL.png)![black and white gopher](http://i.imgur.com/SwkPj.png)
**gocos2d groundhog**  
![groundhog](http://i.imgur.com/7Mnt0.png)
##favorite things
[**archlinux**](http://archlinux.org) [**golang**](http://golang.com) [**stratocaster**](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stratocaster) [**pinkfloyd**](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pink_Floyd)
##links
[**facebook**](http://facebook.com/mortdeus) [**reddit**](http://reddit.com/u/mortdeus) [**email**](mortdeus@gocos2d.org) [**blog**](http://txt.io/mortdeus) [**license**](http://mortdeus.mit-license.org)
